payload.name: pomdps
payload.title: POMDPs: partial observability requires belief states
payload.formal: maintain belief (b(s)) over hidden state; update with observations.
payload.apm2_mapping: agents do not observe the world fully; tool outputs are partial and sometimes adversarial. Maintain belief states tied to evidence, not narratives. This is exactly why APM2 treats tool outputs as untrusted until verified/hashed/stored.
